text:
1⃣First Doses Update on 7 March 📢

416,834 new doses administered yesterday (6 March) across the UK🇬🇧

Total 1st Doses: 22,213,112 (42% of the adult population)

📉-4.7% day on day rate  
📈+2.3% week on week rate 
📈7-day average of 303,366 (up from 302,033)

#vaccine #COVID19 https://t.co/PKyOFbJLew
